revised_title: The Development of the Great Omentum and Transverse Mesocolon
tldr: The authors discuss the development of the great omentum and transverse mesocolon, arguing against Haller's theory and providing evidence for the old account of peritoneal relations. They describe the process of peritoneal fossa disappearance and the resulting position of the transverse colon between the two ascending layers of the great omentum.
